module.caption: AES - Advanced Encryption Standard
module.info: Driver for the AES (Advanced Encryption Standard) module. Provides functions for configuring and initiating ciphering/deciphering with AES algorithms. Several modes (ECB, CBC, OFB, CFB or CTR) and key sizes (128-, 192- or 256-bit) are supported, in addition to manual or DMA-based data input to the AES module.
